com.heroiclabs.nakama

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClient

    public interface Client
    A client for the Nakama server.

      long serverTime() 

    • Method Detail

      • serverTime

        long serverTime()
        Returns:
        The current server time in UTC milliseconds as reported by the server during the last heartbeat exchange. If this client has never been connected the function returns local device current UTC milliseconds.

      • login

        com.stumbleupon.async.Deferred<Session> login(AuthenticateMessage message)
        Parameters:
        message - The AuthenticateMessage to send to the server.
        Returns:
        A Session for the user.

        Returns:
        A Session for the user.
